job description:
Type : Long Term Contract

WE DO NOT WORK WITH CORP - CORP, PLEASE DO NOT APPLY

Job Description:

Your primary responsibilities will include profiling and transforming data.
Your SQL and Statistical skills will be required to analyze, create transformations, develop reporting, and automate data profiling. You will need a good command of SQL and Statistics knowledge to check, identify, report and correct data quality issues.

Skills Required:
Advanced SQL knowledge and a good command of Statistics knowledge is a must have
Skills Preferred:
Working experience in database marketing or automotive marketing data is preferred.
Experience Required:
Minimum 3 years of Working experience in data-centric projects

Education Required:
Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or Physics.
Education Preferred:
Post-graduate degree
